text: @parscale @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump 2100+ Americans died of the Coronavirus TODAY, sociopath. 76,928 dead Americans in 2 months. American Coronavirus deaths are now 28.4% of overall world-wide deaths, up from 24% just last week. The US population is 4.25% of the world’s population. Try giving a damn.
